trans-unit.source: Represents a sorted collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDownAcceleration"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown"></xref> control.
The elements in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDownAccelerationCollection> are sorted by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDownAcceleration.Seconds%2A> property.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDownAccelerationCollection"></xref> class.
Adds a new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDownAcceleration"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDownAccelerationCollection"></xref>.
The item is added while preserving the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDownAccelerationCollection> sorted.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDownAcceleration"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDownAccelerationCollection"></xref>.
acceleration is `null`.
Adds the elements of the specified array to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDownAccelerationCollection"></xref>, keeping the collection sorted.
An array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDownAcceleration"></xref> containing the objects to add to the collection.
accelerations is `null`, or one of the entries in the accelerations array is `null`.
Removes all elements from the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDownAccelerationCollection"></xref>.
Determines whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDownAccelerationCollection"></xref> contains a specific <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDownAcceleration"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDownAcceleration"></xref> to locate in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDownAccelerationCollection"></xref>.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDownAcceleration"></xref> is found in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDownAccelerationCollection"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.

Copies the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDownAccelerationCollection"></xref> values to a one-dimensional <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDownAcceleration"></xref> instance at the specified index.

The one-dimensional <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDownAcceleration"></xref> that is the destination of the values copied from <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDownAccelerationCollection"></xref>.
The index in array where copying begins.
Gets the number of objects in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDownAccelerationCollection"></xref>.
The number of objects in the collection.
Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDownAccelerationCollection"></xref> is read-only.
This property always returns `false`.
`true` if the collection is read-only; otherwise, `false`.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDownAcceleration"></xref> at the specified index number.
The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDownAcceleration"></xref> to get from the collection.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDownAcceleration"></xref> with the specified index.

Removes the first occurrence of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDownAcceleration"></xref> from the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDownAccelerationCollection"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDownAcceleration"></xref> to remove from the collection.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDownAcceleration"></xref> is removed from <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDownAccelerationCollection"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.
Gets the enumerator for the collection.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDownAccelerationCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface.
Iterates over a collection to specify how acceleration should be performed on the control when the up or down button is pressed for specified time period.
Gets the enumerator for the collection.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDownAccelerationCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface.
An iteration over the collection.
